name: Squirrel Game (hawleych)
description:
NOTE: There is a bug when the game starts (after pressing "New Game"), wherein the camera is stuck inside your character. Just move in any direction and it'll fix itself.

Changes

1. Added a new level

2. Added a wall running mechanic

3. Tweaked the player movement and camera setup

4. Added 2 powerups

5. Added tutorial pages to the menu
